mapper.insert: insert into member( MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_GENDER, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_AGREE) values (SEQ_MEMBER.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name},#{mem_gender},#{mem_phone},#{mem_email},#{mem_agree})
mapper.select: select MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_GENDER, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_AGREE from member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_pw = #{mem_pw}
